description: This file defines a Button component for a LightningJS application. It specifies properties, template rendering, state management, initialization, and behavior for the button element, including handling press events.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Initializes the component's state with default values such as size, colors, and callback.

methods.name: onInit
methods.description: Copies relevant props into the component's state during initialization, enabling custom labels, sizes, and callbacks.

methods.name: onEnter
methods.description: Handles the press event by invoking the callback stored in the state, if any.
